Parameters.description: Parameters for the ATOMIC_MODIFY_COMPONENT operation. Atomically checks if a field equals the expected value and modifies it only if the check passes, preventing race conditions.

field.description: Dot-separated field path within the component to modify atomically

expected_value.description: Expected current value for the atomic check. The modification only occurs if the current field value matches this exactly.

new_value.description: New value to set if the atomic check passes

result_variable.description: Context variable name to store the boolean result (true if modification succeeded, false if atomic check failed)
